item.title: Mysql
item.description: Error: “The table does not comply with the requirements by an external plugin” Case 1: no keys 实测集群模式下无主键的表会报上面的错误。 cast函数 MySQL doesn’t permit you to CAST(‘01’ AS INT). It expects instead a SIGNED or UNSIGNED. -- 将string处理为 数
